metadata.title: CVE-2022-3809 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Axiomatic Bento4 and classified asproblematic. Affected by this issue is the function ParseCommandLine of thefile Mp4Tag/Mp4Tag.cpp of the component mp4tag. The manipulation leads todenial of service. The attack may be launched remotely. The exploit hasbeen disclosed to the public and may be used. VDB-212666 is the identifierassigned to this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: kodi-inputstream-adaptive package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
